title: TheWhiteLodge
author: TheWhiteLodge
content: Hey friends!Our OldChief Casino needs to raise nodes and organize hot wallets in BTC, ETH, DOGE, XRP, TRX, USDT.We need a person able to write functions for php/symfony that will manage wallets, allowing us to:1. Issue a permanent address in each currency, assigning it to the user when registering2. Withdraw funds3. Receive and process notifications about the appearance of transactions related to our addresses in the blockchain4. Receive and process transaction confirmation notificationsThe last two items need to be configured both in wallets and in php.Should you are experienced in that or your can advise us someone, please do not hesitate to contact us. BR,Old Chief
